alert.note: Alert for Bay; Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 05 at 12:05PM EDT until April 05 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 95 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 2 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA COFFEE DALE GENEVA HENRY HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBEVILLE, ABBEVILLE MUNICIPAL A/P, ALPINE HEIGHTS, ARGYLE, ASBURY, BARKER STORE, BATTENS CROSSROADS, BEAMON, BENNETT, BLACKWELL FIELD A/P, BLACKWOOD, BONIFAY, BROWNS CROSSROADS, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CENTER RIDGE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CLUSTER SPRINGS, COBB CROSSROADS, COTTONWOOD, CRYSTAL LAKE, DALEVILLE, DE FUNIAK SPRING AIRPORT, DE FUNIAK SPRINGS, DILL, DOTHAN, ECONFINA, ENTERPRISE, ENTERPRISE MUNICIPAL A/P, EUCHEEANNA, EWELL, FADETTE, FIVE POINTS, FORT RUCKER, GANER, GENEVA, GENEVA MUNICIPAL A/P, GRACEVILLE, HACODA, HARTFORD, HEADLAND, HEADLAND MUNICIPAL A/P, HOLMES COUNTY AIRPORT, KEYTON, LAWRENCEVILLE, LEONIA, LOGAN FIELD MUNICIPAL A/P, LYNN HAVEN, MABSON, MALONE, MARIANNA, NEW HOPE, NIXON, ORANGE HILL, OZARK, PANAMA CITY, POPLAR HEAD, RICHTER CROSSROADS, SCREAMER, SIMSVILLE, AND SNEADS.
